did.head: Descriptive Summary
did.repository: Special Collections and Archives, George Mason University Libraries
did.unittitle: George Mason University Men's Basketball NCAA Tournament Run Collection, 2006 2005-2006

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: George Mason University Men's Basketball NCAA Tournament Run Collection, 2006, Special Collections and Archives, George Mason University Libraries

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: information gathered by Special Collection and Archive staff

bioghist.head: Historical Information
bioghist.p: In March 2006 the George Mason men's basketball team under the leadership of Coach Jim Larranaga were selected for the NCAA Tournament. Though they had an exceptional season, they were not expected to advance past the initial round. But after defeating 7th seed Migchigan State, 3rd seed North Carolina (the previous two national champions), Whichita State University, and the Washington D.C. Region's No. 1 seed, the University of Connecticut, Mason climbed into the national spotlight. Its tournament run of four victories is considered one of the most improbable in the history of college basketball. A loss in the Final Four to the eventual National Champion, the University of Florida, ended the run.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: Collection contains news articles, tickets, flyers, promotional items, and other memorabilia from the 2006 NCAA Tournament.

did.unittitle: 2006 NCAA Men's Basketball Tickets March 24 - April 3, 2006

scopecontent.p: Tickets for the NCAA Sweet Sixteen, Elite Eight, Final Four, and Championship games of the tournament . Also included is a ticket pack cover and an admission ticket to Hoop City.

did.unittitle: Embossed Mason Patriots Envelope January 7, 2006

scopecontent.p: Limited-edition color embossed envelope bearing a cancellation stamp of the Mason Patriots logo. The envelope, stamped at Fairfax Station, VA on April 7, 2006 was part of the citywide celebration for the Patriots' tournament run.

did.unittitle: George Mason University Day Proclamation: County of Fairfax, VA March 24, 2006

scopecontent.p: Proclamation by the Fairfax County Board of Supervisors designating Friday, March 24, 2006 as George Mason University Day. Document contains the signature of Gerald E. Connolly, Chairman of the Fairfax County Board of Supervisors and is dated March 24, 2006.

did.unittitle: Certificate of Recognition, County of Fairfax, May 15, 2006 May 15, 2006

scopecontent.p: Certificate of Recognition presented to the George Mason University Men's Basketball Team by the County of Fairfax. Document contains the signature of Gerald E. Connolly, Chairman of the Fairfax County Board of Supervisors and is dated May 15, 2006.

did.unittitle: 2005-06 Men's Basketball Season Souvenirs 2005 - 2006

scopecontent.p: The souvenirs included in this box are: NCAA Final Four ticket holders with lanyards (2), Coach Larranaga music box, George Mason "We Believe" cup, "Go Mason!" buttons (2), Mason Patriots 2006 Final Four badge and lanyard, Mason Patriots temporary tattoos (3), "Larranaga Special" whistles (3), green and yellow pom-pom, and "Go Mason!" thundersticks (2)

did.unittitle: NCAA 2006 Tournament T-Shirts and Small Mason Patriots Posters 2005-2006

scopecontent.p: T-Shirts: Sweet Sixteen, Elite Eight, 2 different Final Four shirts. Posters: School of Management "Heart" Patriots, Mason Madness (2), and Go Mason (3)

did.unittitle: 2005-06 Men's Basketball Season and Tournament Run oversize materials 2005-06

scopecontent.p: Oversized materials related to the 2005-06 basketball season: Washington Post printing plate from March 27, 2006, Fairfax commuter bus "Go Patriots" sign, community signed bus banners (3), and large Mason Patriots posters (5)
